experience.description: Built CV models for ASD emotion detection from body/facial cues; tracked 17 landmarks to classify emotions (e.g., happiness, frustration); created the ROSCO labeled dataset to advance non-verbal analysis.
Built mosquito body-part segmentation pipeline (IoU 0.93); led modeling to boost species classification +8.3% via graph-cut; automated labeling and benchmarked TF/PyTorch models.
Developed infra-thermal perception pipeline; fused acoustic sensors with Deep SORT + Kalman to reach 93.4% UAV tracking; optimized multi-sensor processing on Jetson Nano.
Built AI/IoT health dashboard; applied sequential models to predict behavior (AP 0.89); engineered real-time REST pipeline to normalize sensor data.
